_description: Keeping one’s soul safe — one couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Haue detȝ in mendeNeuere sal senne þi soule
                    schende
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 25.
